private-messages.messageToOfflinePlayer: §aPlayer §b$s§a is offline. He will receive your message when log in.
private-messages.noLastMessageError: §cYou have no one to reply to.
private-messages.ignoredByPlayer: §cYou cannot message §b$s§c, as they are ignoring you.
private-messages.ignoringPlayer: §cYou cannot send messages to §b$s§c because you are ignoring them.
private-messages.help:
§6/pm notification [on/off] §f- Toggle notification sounds
§6/msg <player> <message> §f- Send a private message
§6/reply <message> §f- Reply to the last received message
§6/pm read §f- Read offline messages
§6/ignore <player> §f- Ignore or unignore a player
